SVGAElementHref.summary: The href read-only property of the returns an object reflecting the value of the href attribute, and, in certain cases, the {{SVGAttr("xlink:href")}} {{deprecated_inline}} attribute. It specifies the target URI associated with the link.

remarks.para: This property enables access to the URI set for a link within an SVG document.

SVGAElementHref.value: A indicating the value of the href attribute. Additionally, for elements defined to support it, it reflects the value of the {{SVGAttr("xlink:href")}} {{deprecated_inline}} attribute when the href attribute is not set.
